channel.title: Automation on Not A Journal by Gio
channel.description: Recent content in Automation on Not A Journal by Gio

item.title: The Freelancers' Show on Automation
item.description: Episode 216 of “The Freelancers’ Show” has a great and original conversation on automation. Unlike many other posts and podcasts on the topic, this one focus on how to find out what to automate, and why you should -or shouldn’t- automate something.
